# beget_private_network (Resource)

Beget Private Network resource. Manages isolated private networks for secure communication between compute instances



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `region` (String) Region where the private network is created. Changing this field will recreate the network resource

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Private Network resource identifier. Automatically assigned when the network is created
- `mask` (Number) Subnet mask (prefix length). Automatically assigned when the network is created
- `subnet` (String) Private network subnet address (CIDR notation). Automatically assigned when the network is created
